gameDetails.name: Heaven & Ale: Kegs & More
gameDetails.description:
Return to the 2018 Kennerspiel nominated Heaven & Ale with the Kegs and More expansion!

After years of honing the craft of beer making, the monastery has been commissioned to deliver the glorious ale to the local taverns. Such a challenge requires foresight and planning on your part. In addition to managing resources to brew beer, the monks are also tasked to collect barrels to store the ale and collect hay to ensure your delivery mule is well fed and strong. With the new gameplay elements, Heaven & Ale reminds fans of its modern classic status!

—description from the publisher
